entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 12:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers changing to rain at times heavy overnight. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to freezing rain near midnight. Rain along parts of the coast. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
